About 10 min later, the forward watchman noticed a man onboard a skiff close to the anchor cable, and another man climbing up the anchor chain. The bridge was informed immediately via VHF and the forward watchman shouted at the men. The OOW raised the alarm and sounded the forward whistle. Realising the crew was alerted, the two men escaped immediately. The local Indonesian authority subsequently conducted an investigation.
